sentences.sContent: DAKAR, NewsCore - Wearing white to symbolise purity, worshippers throughout this African capital gathered to pray on one of the final nights of Ramadan.
sentences.sContent_eng: DAKAR, NewsCore - Wearing white to symbolise purity, worshippers throughout this African capital gathered to pray on one of the final nights of Ramadan.
sentences.sCn: 达喀尔，新闻报导—这个非洲国家的礼拜者们穿上代表纯洁的白色衣服聚集在首都，一起在斋月的最后一天祷告。
